name: Xaitron 2
description:
PLEASE don't play this game if you are epileptic!

Xaitron 2 it's my second game. I made it in 2013 with 15 years old so don't expect too much! Oh! and it was made with Game Maker.

The game is only in SPANISH, sorry!

CONTROLS:

  • Press A, D to move and W to jump.
  • Press SPACE BAR or LEFT CLICK to shoot.
  • Press ENTER to reset the game.
  • Press ESCAPE to pause the game.
  • Press F9 to take pictures.
  • Press F4 to change between fullscreen and windowed mode.
  • Press F1 to see this info in game.

ADVICES: 

  • In the BOSS FIGHTS you have to shoot them with the LEFT CLICK.
  • Some SPIKES can be BROKEN with a shoot in any level.

EXTRA: 

  • You can shoot your mother/father (try it!).
  • There is an extra dungeon near the end that you can play to make easier the final path.
